title: D401 AI Camera
metaTitle: D401 Intelligent AI Camera | FleetGoo ADAS
metaDesc: D401 AI Camera with advanced ADAS and DMS capabilities for proactive fleet safety.
fullDescription: A specialized 2MP camera for commercial vehicles, featuring DMS (Driver Monitoring System) capabilities to detect fatigue, distraction, phone use, and smoking. Delivers clear images in complex lighting with >100dB dynamic range.
features: HD Imaging: 1080P/720P resolution with 2MP CMOS sensor
AI Safety: Built-in DMS detection for fatigue, yawning, phone use, smoking, and looking around
Visual Clarity: >100dB wide dynamic range for complex lighting conditions
Flexible Audio: Optional built-in highly sensitive microphone (<45dB)
Robust Design: Automotive-grade reliability with -20°C to 70°C working range
packaging: 1x D401 Camera, 1x Power Cable, 1x Bracket, 1x User Manual
